EmailTemplate.name: RE: Hi there--ghost from Quaker days! (1322516671.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Hi there--ghost from Quaker days! (1322516671.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Soyung,
Its a pleasure to be introduced. We can absolutely help and look forward to chatting with you about how we do that. Feel free to book a time convienent for you in my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
You can also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube: http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4.
I look forward to speaking with you,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: messages-noreply@bounce.linkedin.com [mailto:messages-noreply@bounce.linkedin.com] On Behalf Of Aassia Haq via LinkedIn Sent: Monday, November 28, 2011 12:43 PM To: Steve Arhancet Cc: Soyung Pak Subject: RE: Hi there--ghost from Quaker days!
LinkedInAassia Haq has sent you a message. Date: 11/28/2011 Subject: RE: Hi there--ghost from Quaker days! Soyung - It is so great to hear from you. Apologies for the late reply, I was out of the country. MBO Partners is a great resource if you're thinking about goign out on your own. While we don't faciliate jobs directly we are a big part of the picture for considering independence. I have a colleague who's an expert on this whole transition - perhaps I can connect you to him? We're also luanching a private tool for our associates that facilitates job tips between independents that may be really useful. I so understand your lifestage - and hope MBO can help. By way of this email, I'm connecting you to Steve Aranchet - and if you ever want to catch up via phone to get tips - I'd be happy to help. I can ask him to send you a LI request. Steve-by cc: FYI for Soyung's contact info. Aassia 703-793-6004
On 11/09/11 9:21 AM, Soyung Pak wrote: -------------------- Hi Aassia,
How are you? Sounds like everything is going well. Just wondering about MBO. Do you facilitate contractors with part time jobs? I am curious as I would like to leave the corporate world to be able to spend time with my children, yet would enjoy keeping my foot in the door and not be a stay at home mom. I have heard that there are sites that work with moms in this specific arena, and wasn't sure if your firm is a possible venue for me.
Cheers,
Soyung View/reply to this message Don't want to receive e-mail notifications? Adjust your message settings. © 2011, LinkedIn Corporation
